sentences.en: Caviar and oysters on ice are generally considered the ultimate luxury foods.
sentences.cn: 一般认为，鱼子酱和冰镇牡蛎是顶级美味。

sentences.en: Discover the delights and luxury of a private yacht.
sentences.cn: 体验私人游艇的乐趣和奢华。

sentences.en: During the recession, training budgets were seen as an expendable luxury.
sentences.cn: 在经济衰退期间，培训预算被认为是一项可以节省下来的奢侈费用。

sentences.en: He could not afford luxury food on his pay.
sentences.cn: 靠自己的工资他买不起奢侈的食品。

sentences.en: He rode on the president's luxury train through his own state.
sentences.cn: 他乘坐总统的豪华列车经过自己所在的州。

sentences.en: He was leading a life of luxury in Australia.
sentences.cn: 他在澳大利亚过着豪华舒适的生活。

sentences.en: Hot baths are my favourite luxury.
sentences.cn: 泡个热水澡是我的最大乐事。
巧克力、香水之类的奢侈品

sentences.en: Macau's newest small luxury hotel has a beautiful location.
sentences.cn: 澳门最新的小型豪华饭店地理位置优美。

sentences.en: She invited 750 people aboard the luxury yacht, the Savarona.
sentences.cn: 她邀请了750人乘坐豪华游艇“萨瓦罗纳”号。

sentences.en: She reacted against the mindlessness and luxury of their lives.
sentences.cn: 她对他们生活的盲目和奢侈很反对。

sentences.en: Take your pick from ten luxury hotels.
The dress is lambswool – pure luxury.
sentences.cn: 礼服是用羔羊毛制作的——绝对奢华。

sentences.en: The spa is the last word in luxury and efficiency.
sentences.cn: 这家矿泉疗养浴场极尽奢华，功效极高。

sentences.en: This hotel is the ultimate in luxury.
This year people are going for luxury and buying lifestyle products.
sentences.cn: 今年人们推崇奢华，掀起了购买时尚生活产品的风潮。

sentences.en: We don't live in the lap of luxury, but we're comfortable.
sentences.cn: 我们的生活虽然并非锦衣玉食，也算是衣食无忧。
